name: Pixel Busters Movie Game Jam Edition
name_original: Pixel Busters Movie Game Jam Edition
description:
Game Created By Quinzy and Don6l as part of MovieGameJam2018 hosted on Itch.io.

Some assets are third party.
If not mentioned below in the thanks section all other assets used were created by Quinzy and Don6l.

THANKS TO!

Arcade Classic Font: Made by Jakob Fischer, jakob@pizzadude.dk, www.pizzadude.dk
Pacman Level inspirded and followed by using Tutorial from : https://noobtuts.com/unity/2d-pacman-game
Too Many Cooks 8 Bit version From Rush Coil:

Jesus Christ Super Star Game inspired by tutorial by RHSGameDev : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRaEesKRlggGBR4gKA9Ag9Q
